section.title: Toolbox.Core.Abstractions.IDisposableService Interface Reference

para.para: Base interface for disposable services providing lifecycle management.

listitem.para: Gets the unique name identifying this service instance.
Gets a value indicating whether this service has been disposed.

section.title: Detailed Description
section.para: Base interface for disposable services providing lifecycle management.
This interface extends IDisposable with additional properties for service identification and disposal state tracking.

Property Documentation
IsDisposed IsDisposedToolbox.Core.Abstractions.IDisposableService Toolbox.Core.Abstractions.IDisposableServiceIsDisposed
bool Toolbox.Core.Abstractions.IDisposableService.IsDisposed[get]
Gets a value indicating whether this service has been disposed.
true if the service has been disposed; otherwise, false.
This property should be checked before performing any operation on the service. Operations on disposed services should throw ObjectDisposedException.
Implemented in Toolbox.Core.Base.BaseDisposableService.
